title: Is mystery gifting skins worth the risk?
body:
After mystery gifting myself Silent Night Sona (I guess I'll use it once, Penta for life \m/ ) I decided to do some math on what my odds were to actually getting a skin I would be happy with.

The numbers were a little off due to retired skins that wouldn't show up on the client but it worked out to be roughly a one in five chance. 

Those odds are not great. Say I buy $10 of RP and mystery gift myself twice, I've already spent enough to have RP to just buy one of the skins I like, that's 95% of them. Sure I could get 2 I like, including those I wouldn't have been able to get with the $10 worth, but the odds of not getting something I like are much higher.

Technically that has already happened (Deadly Kennen now SN Sona) so while it might be fun to take the risk, in hindsight it's not really worth the cost.
